channel.title: Dedicated Server
channel.description:
What does a dedicated server look like. How would I buy one? Does the owner of the dedicated server need my files, or does he just give me a dedicated server to hook up to my computer. Basicly I have no idea what a dedicated server is and how I use it. Can someone give me the 411 on this?
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh dude you can code it pretty well but even with the best codes it still has alot to do with your internet…

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

not really internet connection doesn’t really have anything to do with how many players you can hold without lag, it only modifies their connection quality, but if you cant hold more then 30 players you will lag anyway

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

dedicated is a waste of money tbh… i got 1GB RAM and 2.4ghz duel processor and i can host fine… spent just over $1000 on my computer, if i was you i would just buy a nice computer for your server only, at least 2.1 duel processor and about 2GB of RAM will do well and you never have to pay for it again

downside: with 1gb RAM with 60 - 75 players i use about 85% of my memory so its pretty hard to do anything else but host and use the internet :s

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Dedicated server is a program if I’m not mistaking. It can help you when running a server/Game that can not be hosted without being on our computer. Most people use Dedicated so lagg isn’t a problem and aswell as that it can store a quite bit. Honestly you’d have to send the server to the Dedi hoster and he has to pay about 1000+ bucks for a dedi thats actaully good.

Read full topic
